element.name: Improvised Form
element.source: Fester's List of Monsters and Races

description.p: Your experience with different bodies has given you better understanding on how to shape yourself. You are able to recreate any organs that you have previously digested from memory thereby enhancing your ooze or borrowed form. In addition you can add extra features or appendages to any humanoid or beast form as long as you have used them previously.

element.name: Sculptor of Flesh
element.source: Fester's List of Monsters and Races

description.p: You gain the ability to deduce the appearance of a cadaver’s missing tissue and fill in the gapes. You can estimate the proper appearance for a skeleton you haven’t seen the owner of and become a believable form of a creature that the bones belonged to.
